website_summaries.verdict: This set of sleepwear feels very similar to expensive 100% silk pajamas sold in high-end stores. Sizing can be challenging, but the overall appearance suggests luxury at an affordable price point.
pros: Available in a popular shade of white
Fabric is light on skin, breathes well
cons: Material is not colorfast, can stain sheets and furniture
Sizing is not standard – runs very small or very large
Seams are single stitched, not durable

customer_reviews.title: My wife thinks  handsome wearing them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to wear to a sexy party. They did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: santamaria capetanelis

customer_reviews.title: The fabric dye comes of onto bed sheets even after several washings
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review on this item when I first purchased it as excellent. After about 30 days I realized that the dye from the fabric rubs off onto my bedsheets. I did not wash the pajamas before wearing the first time. Then I washed the pajamas twice, and still dye comes off onto the bedsheets. The fit of the top is fine, but the bottoms are slightly snug, but do fit. I ordered the Medium size, and I wear a size 32 waist pants. The reason for two stars is the dye coming off onto the bed sheets and the waist fit is a little snug, but bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Fit - Not for Big Fellas
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on ordering this product. The material feels great and looks sharp. However, I will be returning them. This product isn't for big boys. I got the 4XL but was horrible disappointed when I put them on. The pants are 4 inches too long and the top was about 2.5 inches too long. I look like a little boy who tried on his father's PJs... LoL I ordered 2 different sets. When the other comes tomorrow I will return them both. I'm 5ft 8in and their sizing chart is for average make bodies. There's no way I can fit a medium or large (according to the chart). Those days are long gone.
customer_reviews.author: sms87

customer_reviews.title: I find the quality of the item itself very nice. The material is soft and seems of good ...
customer_reviews.text: Please note that my score is based solely on the quality of the item, and not the shipping time. The shipping time was, as others have suggested, exceedingly long. It took over 6 weeks to arrive, most packages I've ordered from China arrive in less than half that time. Regardless, I find the quality of the item itself very nice. The material is soft and seems of good quality and the sizing was spot on. I will revise that opinion if I find any long term issues....
customer_reviews.author: William Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son at Christmas for a bit of luxury. His wife had shared he did not have any 'mathing PJs"... We all got a good chuckle over these but they were super soft and felt very luxurious. He and his wife go away for week-end get-a-ways....so he said he would 'lounge' very stylishly. Very Hugh Hefnerish!
customer_reviews.author: Patches67

customer_reviews.title: Sized too big and no drawstring on pants
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a large, but the large was much too big for me. I exchanged it for a size medium, which fits much better (though the shirt is still quite a bit larger than I need. If you are tall and skinny like I am, these may not fit as well as you would hope. Also, the pants do not have a drawstring (even though the amazon page says they do), so you cannot adjust the waist size. They also do not have pockets in the pants. On the plus side, they do feel very smooth and look nice overall, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Because of its material and the fit of these silky pajamas I have purchased all of the different colors. I now have one for every night of the week. I look good in each one (according to my wife), and I sleep well. I would recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff jackson

customer_reviews.title: I love the roominess in them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself, a female. I love the roominess in them. I am almost 5' 11' and love the size chart that allows me to find an item tall enough for me. They are also very soft and silky in the inside as well.I tried a female brand, they were satin on the outside but not the inside. These are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great for Women too!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Silk Satin Pajamas set. I’m a 5’3”, 105 pound female, and I ordered a Men’s Medium to aim for a more comfortable fit. The pants sit comfortably at my hips without being too tight or too loose, while the top fit me cozy and baggy the way I was hoping. If you’re looking for a more comfortable alternative to women’s pajamas, this product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are awesome. Not only are they very soft, warm, and silky but they are sexy too. I would be happy to wear these during a romantic evening with a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb H.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and luxurious material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pajama set for a gift to myself for my birthday. It fits perfectly the legs are long enough and I love the luxurious feel of the material. I will be ordering more sets because I like this set of pajamas so much.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps silky feel.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this till I washed them a few times. They are very comfortable and retain the silky feel, unlike other so called satin/polyester I had before. I have 4 sets now, and would/will reorder. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to drape a bit long (despite my size)
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves and inseam seem a bit long since they drape a bit more than expected. I wear pants with 30" inseam and these (size L ordered) also have inseam the same length, yet they drape about 3" longer when I wear them. Not sure how to rate this but cannot give five stars. Feels nice to wear albeit a bit warm in bed.
customer_reviews.author: DeRavenSey

customer_reviews.title: Simply luxurious at great price!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are so luxurious. The fabric looks and feels more like silk. They wash beautifully. The fit is perfect (XL-fit 6' 2"/230 lbs). The price is excellent for such a well made product. I would definitely order them again for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: biloxi kay

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It’s artificial silk which was expected for the price, but has a nice look and feel, it ain’t easy to find a white pajama and this was a satisfactory solution for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Joseloy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and great quality. I purchased a similar pair from a different brand that was more expensive, the fit was off so I returned them and purchased these. The quality is so much better! Will be buying this in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective Waist Draw String
customer_reviews.text: The waist draw string with these pajamas is too thin so it slips and loosens as I wear the PJs. In addition, the ends of the draw strings were tied into large knots which where too large and complicated to untie. I will have to locate a suitable draw string from another source to be able to use these PJs.
customer_reviews.author: J.L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: As part of a Halloween custom and then we continued to use them. They have held up well. Wash nicely and feel so good.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pajamas I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pajamas I've ever bought.The fit is almost perfect {legs are a little long but not a problem}. They feel great,very soft and comfortable. Well made. I washed them in cold water on gentle and dry'ed them in the dryer on gentle,no problems.I will buy again. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Pajamas Have found
customer_reviews.text: I like the perfect fit. quality and style. Have been bying pajamas from a well known catalog but the new order were of a new fabic at twice the price for Lonzu sleepwear. Arrived promply despite the bad weather. Don't change a thing. Got to be the most comfortable pajamas I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Cleon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, very soft - high quality and I'm a difficult customer
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered two more pairs. Extremely comfortable, will make you want to go to bed just to be in them. Soft, well constructed, solid stitching, elastic waste and tie is nice. They hang well, look great and came with a sweet handwritten letter from the vendor asking for a positive post if we liked them or to return them right away. They look and feel like $100+ silk pajamas, but actually a little softer. Great price. I am concerned about the post that warned of the colors not being set so purchased white. Washing instructions are hand was and hang dry in the sun (loved that)
customer_reviews.author: Super JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice material good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice satin jammies. Comfortable and the wife loves them... Cue up Right Said Fred: "I'm too sexy..."
customer_reviews.author: Jeremylpn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: The satin pajamas are so light and comfortable that you hardly know you are wearing anything and they make it easier to turn in bed.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: The best pajamas said I have ever head
customer_reviews.text: I think your product is the best pair of pajamas I have ever had!! Naturally I wear them every night and get a great nights sleep. Just the right size everything is great. Do you make men’s full breed panties in the same material? Meaning covering the whole butt. Again I cannot say enough about the quality the way it fits and how I sleep and get a good relax and sleep
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Very drop color
customer_reviews.text: Very serious color drop, the first time I washed with a washing machine, the whole one cylinder of clothes was all red (for this reason I scrapped a cylinder of clothes) My clothes, quilts, beds, including the walls I rely on are all red, I am this time Shopping, very unhappy, this is too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!! WARNING!!! The black dye will permanently soil bed linens. They ruined my good set of linens. Others had the same experience, but stupid me, I bought them anyway. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft
customer_reviews.text: They will stain white sheets. I wore them to bed one night and my sheets were dark blue when I woke up. They were permanently stained. This was after washing the pajamas twice beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and color is so vibrant! I wore this outfit for a 90s theme gathering and it was a hit!

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good and Feels Good
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. They fit perfect! I am about 6'3 and 193 pounds. I ordered extra large. It isva comfortable loose fit with a perfect length. I will order again.

customer_reviews.title: These are just what i have been needing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. They fit well and my wife loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy. Nice looking. Feels good to the touch.

customer_reviews.text: i sleep very comfortable in these pajamas. Sometimes when you yoss and turn, your shirt or pants might wring up a bit. but with these pajamas, they just slide over with you as you turn. true to size

customer_reviews.title: looks good in package, but have not worn them yet
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when I visit my grandkids and sleep over, I do not want to scare the bejesus out of them, so take along flannel jammies, but these look cooler and comfortable. Good price, and should pack in my overnight bag.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my Tween son for Christmas and he LOVES them!! Loves the soft texture- would live in them every day if he could. He is generally boys size XL(14-16); size small men’s fit well.

customer_reviews.title: But they are amazing and we will most certainly be ordering more in ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a bit of a wait for these because of how far they had to ship. But they are amazing and we will most certainly be ordering more in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and very good at what is good price...

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable summer pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced satin pajamas, very comfortable, great to sleep in, especially in warm weather. I am 6ft 3 in, 200 pounds, and the double X fit just right

customer_reviews.title: Men's PJ'S
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the hubby. We both love them, soft, comfortable, perfect fit.

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are very well made. I do wash in cold water and dry in dryer for about 10 minutes and then hang them for further drying.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic feel to these PJs
customer_reviews.text: Will never wear any other kind of pj's after trying these. Have washed several times (delicate cycle) with absolutely no issues. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: estoer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Improvement
customer_reviews.text: The button holes on the top were not cut had to do in order to button up the top. On the bottom left leg inside seams was not sewed 3 inches up I did it by hand to ensure it did not come apart all the way up the leg. You need better quality control to ensure that this does not happen all the time. On the blue set everything was ok except once again the button holes not cut including the fly on the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Koski

customer_reviews.title: Nice silky PJ’s
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. The length in the pants very long and had to hem. Otherwise good item and will work for costume

customer_reviews.title: Material Length Nice Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My wife (lesbian stud) looked great! Oh so sexy . The material was lovely. Silk. Real. Heavy but light & airy. Not cheap at all. She's heavy. Short. About 5'2 weight 230 she wears a 3x but selected 4 x so it's not tight in the thighs and she did damn good! Will buy again! Shipping was vast! Literally 2 days bc we have PRIME! PARIS-ATL GA

customer_reviews.title: Feels like real silk.  Very nice fabric.

customer_reviews.title: He loved them. They were way too long though but ...
customer_reviews.text: He loved them. They were way too long though but he took them to someone and had them professionally altered. They cut off a portion and resewed the cuff back on. Looks perfect now.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger than you expect
customer_reviews.text: The material is very comfortable -- but the arms on the jacket are at least 6" shorter than I would have expected. Pants are just right.

product_meta.title: Lonxu Mens Satin Long Button-Down Pajamas Set, S M L XL 2XL 3XL 4XL
feature_bullets: Material --- Light Weight Satin , Very Silky Feeling and Help you Have a Sound Sleep.
Elastic Waist with Drawstring --- Comfortable and Relaxing Fit, Adjust it As you like.
Humanized Design --- The pants Has Fly Opening, Mens Satin Pajama Set / Big and tall satin pajamas for men.

❤Size --- U.S. Size, Available in S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL,4XL, Our Designers are online 24 hours to check the Sizes for buyers,Please Contact us if you are not sure about your Size after read the Size Chart.
